EmailTemplate.name: IFAP reminder N&B
EmailTemplate.subject: Financial Security Reminder, Case Number {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Madam/Sir,
In accordance with the IATA Passenger Sales Agency Rules, annual examinations of the financial standing of all IATA Accredited Agents are conducted to ensure they continue to meet the minimum financial standards. These standards are published in the Travel Agent’s Handbook.
For this purpose you are requested to submit your latest financial statements by uploading the following documents.
- Balance Sheet - Profit and Loss - Audit Report
Your financial documents must now be uploaded only through the new IATA Financial Assessment Portal by using following link:
www.iata.org/ifap
Your Username is the e-mail address to which you received this message. If you are registering on the IATA Financial Assessment Portal for the first time, please go to “Not registered yet?” and enter this email address to register.
Please refer to the FAQ sheet for instructions on how to upload your financial statements and other frequently asked questions.
Deadline for submission: 9 October 2012
For any queries on this matter including updating your email and contact details, please contact us through http://www.iata.org/cs and refer to your case number mentioned in the Subject of this message.
Thank you in advance for your cooperation.
Sincerely,
IATA Operations & Service Center Europe
